title: If a “helen” is an amount of beauty, then “1 millihelen is...
content:
If a “helen” is an amount of beauty, then “1 millihelen is the amount of beauty needed to launch a single ship”. See also the list of humorous units of measurement (e.g. “1 kilowarhol – famous for 15,000 minutes, or 10.42 days”). (via robinsloan.com)

💬 Join the discussion on kottke.org →
author: Jason Kottke
